meta.description: HeyPet case study: Pet sitting marketplace platform connecting pet owners with trusted carers through real-time communication.
meta.ogTitle: HeyPet Case Study — House of Agile
meta.ogDescription: Pet sitting marketplace platform with real-time messaging and trusted carer matching.

hero.title: HeyPet
hero.description: Social network for pet owners with real-time messaging, location-based services, and community features.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Pet owners struggled to find trusted sitters and coordinate care reliably. Existing solutions lacked real-time communication and trust signals needed to build confidence between owners and carers.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.content: Built a marketplace platform focused on real-time communication, smart matching, and a streamlined booking flow. Implemented robust profiles, reviews, and messaging to establish trust and accelerate conversions.

results.title: Results & Impact
results.content: Launched a reliable two-sided marketplace that enabled fast, trust-driven matches and seamless bookings. The platform delivered a consistent user experience while scaling communications and scheduling flows.
